00015 class Plugins_Linkedin_Cron extends Common_Cron
00016 {
00017     protected $_account;
00018     /**
00019      * @var Zend_Oauth_Client
00020      */
00021     protected $_client;
00022     protected $_conf;
00023 
00024     /**
00025      * @return void
00026      */
00027     function __construct()
00028     {
00029         // Call the Model constructor
00030         parent::__construct();
00031     }
00032 
00033     /**
00034      * Método encargado de establecer conexión con Linkedin
00035      * @param User_Accounts_Data $account
00036      * @param obj $auth
00037      * (non-PHPdoc)
00038      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#connect($idp)
00039      */
00040     public function connect($account)
00041     {
00042         $this->start = microtime();
00043 
00044         $this->_account = $account;
00045         $this->_idUP = $this->_account->getId();
00046         $client = unserialize($account->getAuth());
00047 
00048         $this->_ci->config->load('apikeys', TRUE);
00049         $this->_config = $this->_ci->config->item('linkedin', 'apikeys');
00050 
00051         $options = array(
00052             'version' => '1.0',
00053             'localUrl' => site_url("app/testing"),
00054             'callbackUrl' => site_url('accounts/auth'),
00055             'requestTokenUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/requestToken',
00056             'userAuthorizationUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/authorize',
00057             'accessTokenUrl' => 'https://api.linkedin.com/uas/oauth/accessToken',
00058             'consumerKey' => $this->_config["key"],
00059             'consumerSecret' => $this->_config["secret"],
00060         );
00061 
00062         $this->_client = $client->getHttpClient($options);
00063         $this->_client->setMethod(Zend_Http_Client::GET);
00064     }
00065 
00066     /**
00067      * Método encargado de recoger los timelines del usuario y sus amigos
00068      * @return void
00069      *
00070      * (non-PHPdoc)
00071      * @see application/models/Common/Common_Cron#update()
00072      */
00073     public function update()
00074     {
00075         $this->_client->setUri('http://api.linkedin.com/v1/people/~/network/updates');
00076         $this->_client->setParameterGet("type","SHAR");
00077 
00078         $response = $this->_client->request();
00079         $content =  $response->getBody();
00080 
00081         $xml = new SimpleXMLElement($content);
00082 
00083         //$this->save($xml);
00084         Plugins_Linkedin_DB::save($xml, 0, $this->_account);
00085 
00086         $this->_client->setParameterGet("scope","self");
00087         $response = $this->_client->request();
00088         $content =  $response->getBody();
00089 
00090         $xml = new SimpleXMLElement($content);
00091 
00092         Plugins_Linkedin_DB::save($xml, 1, $this->_account);
00093 
00094         if ($this->debugMode === true) {
00095             echo "\r\n Linkedin cron elapset time : ".$this->elapsedTime()."s\r\n";
00096         }
00097 
00098         $accountMapper = User_Accounts_Mapper::get_instance();
00099         $this->_account->setLastUpdate(time());
00100 
00101         $data = array(
00102             "lastUpdate" => $this->_account->getLastUpdate()
00103         );
00104 
00105         $accountMapper->updateFromArray($this->_account->getId(), $data);
00106     }
00107 }
